description: Proceed straight through the pedestrian plaza, passing outdoor cafe seating on both sides. Continue forward past the grey building marked 'SCENE DES TELEGRAPHES' on the right and a building with a geometric triangular facade on the left. The path ends near the 'ceruleum' building and colorful seating.
